name: Puck
title: Faerie Dragon
lore: A creature of mischief and magic, Puck delights in confusing and outmaneuvering enemies.

illusoryOrb.name: Illusory Orb
illusoryOrb.description: Launches an orb that damages enemies. Puck can teleport to the orb's location.

waning_rift.name: Waning Rift
waning_rift.description: Teleports to a location, silencing and damaging nearby enemies.

phaseShift.name: Phase Shift
phaseShift.description: Puck shifts out of existence, becoming invulnerable for a short time.

dreamCoil.name: Dream Coil
dreamCoil.description: Creates a coil that latches to enemies. Breaking the leash stuns and damages them.
